about_the_game:
Adventure awaits in Port Royal, a town of treasures, mysteries and beautiful women! This epic, story-rich experience features hundreds of animated shots (mostly naughty ones), and a large world, filled with collectible treasures, booty calls, and an abundance of fun secrets and mysteries to uncover.



This short preview is a brief example of the characters and situations that you will encounter in the game in visual novel format.

This basic demo does not include point and click navigation for character movement and environment exploration. There is also no inventory or object collection system which is also offered in the full version of the game.
